Ability to build ±35,000 SF within designated outparcel pad
Conveniently situated near Wake Forest University and Hanes Brands Headquarters, with easy access off Highway 52/115, the center is well located to serve the Winston Salem Market
With a population of 1.6 million, the Winston-Salem/Greensboro/High Point MSA is the second-largest in North Carolina

The twelve county region, commonly known as the Piedmont Triad, has enjoyed steady growth as a central member of the South’s ‘Urban Crescent’, a high-growth corridor extending from Atlanta to Raleigh-Durham along I-85

The Triad is home to a number of significant employers including Wake Forest University and Medical Center, Reynolds American, Wells Fargo, BB&T, Volvo Trucks North America, AT&T, Labcorp, Lorillard and Hanesbrands

The Triad is an optimum residential and business location because of easy access to five interstates, abundant labor, the Blue Ridge Mountains and the Atlantic coast; the region is poised to continue to prosper due to its quality of life, low-cost of living, mild climate, business-friendly environment, and diverse economic base

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 1,500 - 4,550 SF SMALL SHOP SPACE AND ±35,000 SF OUTPARCEL AVAILABLE
